title: IEEE CS, PES University
description: Architected and implemented a novel hybrid GAN-VAE system for artistic style transfer, combining an encoder for feature extraction with advanced generative networks, achieving 40% improved style preservation compared to baseline models

Led comprehensive comparative analysis of multiple GAN architectures (Cycle GAN, Attention GAN), optimizing the final three-component architecture through systematic experimentation and achieving state-of-the-art results in artistic transformation quality

title: Toyota Kirloskar Motor
description: Developed and deployed an enterprise-level automated sentiment analysis system using NLTK and Python, revolutionizing review processing from 7 hours to 10 seconds, while enabling seamless access for 100+ employees across company LAN infrastructure

Engineered a real-time data analysis pipeline with 99% efficiency improvement (4 hours to 5 seconds), incorporating robust DevOps practices for deployment and maintaining 100% data accuracy across multiple analytics solutions

title: CDSAML, PES University
description: Developed a breakthrough Kannada-to-English speech translation pipeline surpassing Googleâ€™s Long Model benchmarks, implementing a comprehensive seven-stage system for real-time processing
